name: tm80
effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. They may also make the targets flinch.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. They may also make the targets flinch.
